# k-stepper-header-item

**_`k-stepper-header-item` is a part of the `k-stepper` family of components._**

`k-stepper-header-item` is Vuh's web component for a stepper header's item.

It should only be used as a child to `k-stepper-header`.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description | Type      | Default |
| --------- | --------- | ----------- | --------- | ------- |
| `done`    | `done`    |             | `boolean` | `false` |
| `started` | `started` |             | `boolean` | `false` |


## Events

| Event         | Description | Type                                                      |
| ------------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
| `stepClicked` |             | `CustomEvent<{ stepNumber: number; translate: number; }>` |
